prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of Robert Lewis Harrison, n.d.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, consisting of clippings, programmes, and personal letters to Col. Harrison, member of New York City's School Board. Includes letters to Basil Gildersleeve and Francis Smith; and Autobiography of George Tucker, 1858 (typescript).

did.unittitle: Correspondence of Robert Lewis Harrison and empty envelopes n.d.
Business Papers of Robert Lewis Harrison: substantial number of tax notices to J. S. Toombs n.d.
Newspaper clippings, many concerning a contest for the N.Y. Public School Board Presidency in 1913 in which Harrison was involved ca. 1900 - 1914
Papers of Robert Lewis Harrison: calling cards, banquet programs, church programs, odd clippings, photographs n.d.
Papers of Robert Lewis Harrison: calling cards, invitations, banquet programs, memorabilia n.d.
George Tucker's Autobiography and clippings re Tucker 1858
